item.title: Presenter (Level 5)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Pilgrim (Level 5)
item.description: Performed a rebase using git rebase --onto.

item.title: Apprentice Investigator (Level 3)
item.description: Used git blame to annotate a file with information about how each line changed.

item.title: Thug (Level 5)
item.description: Forced pushed a branch with git push -f

item.title: Seamstress (Level 4)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Pilgrim (Level 4)
item.description: Performed a rebase using git rebase --onto.

item.title: Blacksmith (Level 5)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Apprentice Banker (Level 3)
item.description: Join two or more development histories together with git merge.

item.title: Archivist (Level 6)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Stone Mason (Level 6)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Locksmith (Level 5)
item.description: Add Signed-off-by line at the end of the commit log message using git commit -s.

item.title: Product Manager (Level 4)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Master Author (Level 7)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Socialite (Level 5)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Master Fisherman (Level 8)
item.description: Look for specified patterns in the current repository with git grep.

item.title: Postman (Level 4)
item.description: Send a collection of patches with git imap-send or git send-email

item.title: Master Historian (Level 8)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Master Historian (Level 7)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Historian (Level 6)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Apprentice Messenger (Level 1)
item.description: Applied a patch using git am.
